page.title: 17AMENITIES IN THE WEST WIGHT
page.content:
The quickest way to get to the West Wight is by the ferry boat from Lymington to Yarmouth.Then you would catch a bus or a taxi to the West Wight.When you get there,you could visit Alum Bay where you could go in the Clock Museum which is a museum with lots of different clocks in it.You could visit the coloured sands.You see the Needles lighthouse and go on the chairlift and buy an ice cream.There are quite a few hotels to stay in. You can stay in the Oakfield Hotel or Solent Court and lots more such as the Farringford and Granville Hotel.
Louise Cramp 9 years
